trans: Support a review of domestic wastewater and municipal wastewater permitting regulations.

original_text: The targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions agreed at that conference are a vital first step in the battle against global warming.
We sluiten industriële kringlopen op een voldoende lage schaal zodat we langeafstandstransport van grondstoffen of goederen verminderen.
trans: We close industrial loops at a sufficiently low scale so that we reduce long-distance transport of raw materials or goods.

original_text: Wir wollen sie verpflichten, die Einhaltung von Menschenrechten, Umwelt- und Sozialstandards in ihrer gesamten Lieferkette nachzuweisen.
trans: We want to oblige them to demonstrate compliance with human rights, environmental and social standards throughout their entire supply chain.

original_text: Accélérer la signature d’un accord Kyoto-bis radical visant à diminuer de 15 à 30% les émissions de CO2 pour 2020 et 60 à 80% pour 2050 ;
trans: Accelerate the signing of a radical Kyoto-bis agreement aimed at reducing CO2 emissions by 15 to 30% for 2020 and 60 to 80% for 2050;

original_text: As the terrible impact of the floods in Britain showed last year, climate change is now an issue of national, as well as global security.
Była to główna agenda dyskusji o klimacie i możliwości zaradzenia kryzysowi klimatycznemu zgodnie z możliwościami wszystkich uczestników.
trans: This was the main agenda of the discussion about climate and the possibilities of addressing the climate crisis according to the capabilities of all participants.

original_text: Dankzij de duurzaamheidsbonus kan 10% van de aankoopprijs van deze producten integraal afgetrokken worden van de verschuldigde belasting.
trans: Thanks to the sustainability bonus, 10% of the purchase price of these products can be fully deducted from the tax due.

original_text: De geïndustrialiseerde landen zijn primair verantwoordelijk voor de uitstoot van broeikasgassen die leiden tot de opwarming van de aarde.
trans: Industrialized countries are primarily responsible for greenhouse gas emissions that lead to global warming.

original_text: ed eseguendo le seguenti valutazioni (acquisendo progressivamente i dati relativi a ciascun settore delle schede): cambiamento climatico;
trans: and carrying out the following assessments (progressively acquiring data relating to each sector of the sheets): climate change;

original_text: Ekonomiky iných krajín tak budú zvýhodnené, resp. vysporiadanie sa s týmito cieľmi mať podobu podvodu (viď emisné škandály automobiliek).
trans: The economies of other countries will thus be favored, or dealing with these goals has the form of fraud (see emissions scandals of car companies).

original_text: Et stærkere klimaråd, der kan løfte opgaven med at udregne CO2-budgetter og tackle klimaudfordringerne sammen med regering og erhvervsliv
trans: A stronger climate council that can take on the task of calculating CO2 budgets and tackling the climate challenges together with government and business

original_text: Het vrijwaren van natuurverbindingsgebieden, ook rekening houdend met de migratie van soorten veroorzaakt door de opwarming van de aarde.
trans: Safeguarding nature corridors, also taking into account the migration of species caused by global warming.

original_text: I det sammanhanget är det särskilt viktigt att fortsätta ansträngningarna för att få till stånd en lösning på den nukleära frågan i Iran.
trans: In that context, it is particularly important to continue efforts to achieve a solution to the nuclear issue in Iran.

original_text: išnaudoti smulkiojo ir vidutinio vietos verslo interesą ir potencialą vystyti saulės, vėjo, ir kitokią darnią atsinaujinančią energetiką.
trans: exploit the interest and potential of small and medium-sized local businesses to develop solar, wind and other sustainable renewable energy.

original_text: la reducción de las emisiones de CO2 derivadas de los sistemas de calefacción, a través de la exigencia legal del certificado energético.
trans: the reduction of CO2 emissions derived from heating systems, through the legal requirement of the energy certificate.

original_text: Le stockage en profondeur sera définitivement arrêté et les combustibles irradiés seront stockés de manière à assurer leur réversibilité.
trans: Deep storage will be definitively stopped and irradiated fuel will be stored in such a way as to ensure their reversibility.

original_text: Rahvamaja kui kultuuri tugistruktuur olgu tasuta kohalike seltside koosolekute ja ürituste korraldamiseks ja ligipääsuks  IT-vahenditele.
trans: The public house as a cultural support structure should be free for organizing meetings and events of local societies and for access to IT tools.

original_text: Reducir las emisiones del transporte y maquinaria "no de carretera", aprobando planes de renovación de maquinaria agrícola en particular,
trans: Reduce emissions from "non-road" transportation and machinery, approving renewal plans for agricultural machinery in particular,

original_text: Segrevanje ozračja, podnebne spremembe ter s tem fenomenom povezane elementarne nesreče predstavljajo izjemno visok strošek vsake države.
trans: Global warming, climate change and the natural disasters associated with this phenomenon represent an extremely high cost for every country.

original_text: Um die Österreicherinnen und Österreicher zu entlasten, spricht sich das BZÖ für eine Senkung der Mehrwertsteuer auf Grundnahrungsmittel,
trans: In order to relieve the burden on Austrians, the BZÖ is in favor of reducing the VAT on basic foods,
partyname: Alliance for the Future of Austria

original_text: Wir wollen daher im privaten Bereich mehr Sensibilisierung und international eine bessere Zusammenarbeit im Kampf gegen Umweltverbrecher.
trans: We therefore want more awareness in the private sector and better cooperation internationally in the fight against environmental criminals.

original_text: Za Slovenijo in na ravni celotne Evropske unije se bomo zavzemali za 90-95 % zmanjšanje emisij do leta 2050, z ustreznimi vmesnimi cilji.
trans: For Slovenia and at the level of the entire European Union, we will advocate for a 90-95% reduction in emissions by 2050, with corresponding intermediate goals.

original_text: ·                Mettre en place une structure commune de lutte contre les pollutions et de gestion de l’écosystème de la mer Méditerranée
trans: ·            Establish a common structure to combat pollution and manage the ecosystem of the Mediterranean Sea

original_text: 53.Een winddecreet voorziet een regelgevend kader voor een zorgvuldige en democratische planning en inplanting van windmolens op het land.
trans: 53.A wind decree provides a regulatory framework for careful and democratic planning and installation of wind turbines on land.

original_text: 7.7 Изграждане на капацитет и компетенции на структурите и служителите в горите за адаптивно управление при климатичните предизвикателства
trans: 7.7 Building capacity and competences of structures and employees in forests for adaptive management in the face of climate challenges
partyname: Citizens for European Development of Bulgaria

original_text: Actul normativ emis de Guvernul Ciolos majorează preţul pentru 65% dintre medicamentele din Catalogul naţional, respectiv 3.536 din 5.430.
trans: The normative act issued by the Ciolos Government increases the price for 65% of the medicines in the National Catalog, respectively 3,536 out of 5,430.

original_text: Az öntözéshez szükséges vízhasználat árszabályozásakor a fenntarthatósági (ezen belül környezeti, szociális) szempontokból kell kiindulni,
trans: When regulating the price of water used for irrigation, it is necessary to start from sustainability (including environmental and social) aspects,

original_text: Ca urmare, noi, membrii Partidului Democrat, cetățeni ai României ca și dumneavoastră, ne angajăm, să asigurăm un mediu de afaceri sănătos
trans: As a result, we, the members of the Democratic Party, citizens of Romania like you, are committed to ensuring a healthy business environment

original_text: Dit betekent ook dat mensen zich bewust worden van de werkelijke kosten van economische activiteiten voor ons milieu en onze leefomgeving.
trans: This also means that people become aware of the true costs of economic activities for our environment and our living environment.

original_text: En 1998 la inversión directa en el exterior superaba los 2,7 billones de ptas. (más del 3% del PIB) y en 1999 se aproximará al 5% del PIB.
trans: In 1998, direct investment abroad exceeded 2.7 billion pesetas. (more than 3% of GDP) and in 1999 it will be close to 5% of GDP.

original_text: Energetická politika nebere ohled na potřeby zvýšené ochrany klimatu, nedoceňuje bezpečnostní aspekty a podceňuje energetickou efektivitu.
trans: Energy policy does not take into account the needs of increased climate protection, does not appreciate safety aspects and underestimates energy efficiency.

original_text: Ett kraftfullt och konstruktivt EU krävs för att åstadkomma ett globalt klimatavtal som håller den globala uppvärmningen under två grader.
trans: A strong and constructive EU is required to achieve a global climate agreement that keeps global warming below two degrees.

original_text: Rozpoczęliśmy rekrutację kadr dyplomatycznych na podstawie kompetencji, bez nieuzasadnionego faworyzowania jednego zamkniętego środowiska.
trans: We have started recruiting diplomatic staff on the basis of competences, without unjustified favoring of one closed environment.

original_text: Uma política de redução de emissões de gases de efeito de estufa (GEE) com base num normativo específico, definido e acompanhado pela ONU,
trans: A policy for reducing greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions based on specific regulations, defined and monitored by the UN,

original_text: We will introduce measures to militate against climate change and its effects, including rising sea levels, storms, coastal flooding, etc.
Why? Because the 2008 Climate Change Act, an Act rooted in EU folly, drives up costs, undermines competitiveness and hits jobs and growth.
Zabezpečíme dostupnosť zdravotných špecialistov tak, aby pacient nemusel cestovať viac ako určitú vzdialenosť a čakať viac ako určitý čas.
trans: We will ensure the availability of health specialists so that the patient does not have to travel more than a certain distance and wait more than a certain time.

original_text: Nasprotno,   rešitev   okoljskih   problemov   in   tudi   gospodarske   krize   je   v   izvedbi   strategije   trajnostne   energije.
trans: On the contrary, the solution to environmental problems and also to the economic crisis lies in the implementation of a sustainable energy strategy.

original_text: De klimaatverandering heeft een grote impact op burgers en bedrijven, maar ook onze leefomgeving ondervindt de veranderingen aan den lijve.
trans: Climate change has a major impact on citizens and companies, but our living environment is also personally affected by the changes.

original_text: Energijos gamybai būtina išnaudoti visus vietinius energijos šaltinius, tarp jų – išrūšiuotas ir netinkamas perdirbti komunalines atliekas.
trans: For energy production, it is necessary to use all local energy sources, including sorted and unsuitable municipal waste for processing.

original_text: experts verwachten dat honderden miljoenen mensen per jaar moeten vluchten voor natuurrampen als we de opwarming van de aarde niet stoppen.
trans: experts expect that hundreds of millions of people will have to flee natural disasters every year if we don't stop global warming.

original_text: H πολιτική για το περιβάλλον συμπληρώνεται με την προστασία των ανανεώσιμων φυσικών πόρων και την ορθολογική αξιοποίηση των μη ανανεώσιμων.
trans: Environmental policy is complemented by the protection of renewable natural resources and the rational utilization of non-renewable ones.

original_text: Olukorra parandamiseks peame vajalikuks loodusrikkuse, loodusvarde säästmise ja kliimamuutuste teemade käsitlemist kõigil haridustasemetel.
trans: In order to improve the situation, we consider it necessary to address the topics of natural wealth, conservation of natural resources and climate change at all levels of education.

original_text: Om onze kinderen en kleinkinderen dezelfde kansen en levenskwaliteit te geven, beperken we de uitstoot van broeikasgassen zo veel mogelijk.
trans: To give our children and grandchildren the same opportunities and quality of life, we limit greenhouse gas emissions as much as possible.

original_text: Sem essa alteração estrutural, dificilmente as políticas de redução das desigualdades poderá atingir resultados expressivos e sustentáveis.
trans: Without this structural change, it will be difficult for policies to reduce inequalities to achieve significant and sustainable results.

original_text: Slovenija premalo izkorišča potencial na področju obnovljivih virov energije (v nadaljevanju OVE), zato bomo v prihodnje ta delež povečali.
trans: Slovenia is underutilizing the potential in the field of renewable energy sources (hereafter RES), so we will increase this share in the future.

original_text: Spotřebitelé pak svoji volbou podpoří fond, ze kterého obchodník financuje rozvoj dalších výroben elektřiny z obnovitelných zdrojů energie.
trans: Consumers will then, by their choice, support the fund, from which the merchant finances the development of additional electricity production plants from renewable energy sources.

original_text: Προωθούμε μετά από μελέτες την πραγματική ενοποίηση με ασφαλιστική λογική που οδηγεί σε Ταμεία λειτουργικά σύγχρονα και οικονομικά βιώσιμα.
trans: After studies, we promote real integration with an insurance logic that leads to operationally modern and financially sustainable Funds.

original_text: Довършване на изграждането, въвеждане и реално функциониране на нова система за борба с градушките, покриваща цялата територия на страната.
trans: Completion of the construction, introduction and actual functioning of a new system to combat hail, covering the entire territory of the country.
partyname: Citizens for European Development of Bulgaria

original_text: Разчитаме нашата външна политика и дипломация да насочат своята дейност освен към европейските пазари и към страни с устойчив висок растеж.
trans: We rely on our foreign policy and diplomacy to direct their activity beyond the European markets and to countries with sustainable high growth.

original_text: - Elaboración en paralelo del planeamiento de programas locales tipo "Agendas 21" de acción ambiental a largo plazo hacia la sostenibilidad.
trans: - Parallel preparation of the planning of local "Agendas 21" type programs for long-term environmental action towards sustainability.

original_text: A modern rendszerirányítási szemléletmódban a megújuló források aránya egyes előrejelzések szerint 2050-re akár 100 százalékra is növelhető.
trans: In the modern system management approach, the proportion of renewable sources can be increased to 100 percent by 2050 according to some forecasts.

original_text: A nőknek a férfiakkal azonos lehetőségekkel kell rendelkezniük az oktatás, az egészségügy, a munkaerőpiac, a szociális biztonság területein.
trans: Women must have the same opportunities as men in the areas of education, healthcare, the labor market, and social security.

original_text: Angesichts des Klimawandels geht es nicht um immer mehr Autos, sondern um eine Verkehrswende hin zu weniger motorisiertem Individualverkehr.
trans: In view of climate change, it is not about more and more cars, but rather about a shift in transport towards less motorized individual transport.

original_text: De opwarming van de aarde, de verschraling van natuurlijke hulpbronnen, de verloedering van de leefomgeving treffen altijd eerst de armsten.
trans: Global warming, the depletion of natural resources, and the degradation of the environment always affect the poorest first.

original_text: Dotar de una tarjeta sanitaria común para todo el territorio nacional que permita el acceso a la historia sanitaria y la receta electrónica.
trans: Provide a common health card for the entire national territory that allows access to health history and electronic prescription.

original_text: E’ necessario e possibile riaprire la grande questione dell’ambiente che finora è stata subordinata alle logiche dell’impresa e del mercato.
trans: It is necessary and possible to reopen the great question of the environment which until now has been subordinated to the logic of business and the market.

original_text: energijos efektyvumo ar atsinaujinančios energijos naudojimą transporto sektoriuje, žemės ūkyje, viešuosiuose ir gyvenamuosiuose pastatuose;
trans: the use of energy efficiency or renewable energy in the transport sector, agriculture, public and residential buildings;

original_text: However, incinerators can have negative environmental and public health impacts, which is why they are rarely welcomed by local communities.
In de zoektocht naar alternatieven voor olie en het terugdringen van de CO2-uitstoot en fijnstof spelen biobrandstoffen een belangrijke rol.
trans: Biofuels play an important role in the search for alternatives to oil and in reducing CO2 emissions and particulate matter.

original_text: Investimento total na ordem dos 200 M€/ano para poupar 400 M€ em barris de petróleo importados e reduzir dependência energética do exterior;
trans: Total investment in the order of €200 M/year to save €400 M in imported oil barrels and reduce energy dependence from abroad;

original_text: Non content de favoriser les économies d’énergie, le PS entend tout mettre en œuvre pour développer le potentiel des énergies renouvelables.
trans: Not content with promoting energy savings, the PS intends to do everything possible to develop the potential of renewable energies.

original_text: oraz realizował współpracę energetyczną ze Stanami Zjednoczonymi w zakresie importu skroplonego gazu ziemnego i rozwoju energetyki atomowej.
trans: and implemented energy cooperation with the United States in the field of import of liquefied natural gas and the development of nuclear energy.

original_text: Radykalnie zwiększymy udział energii odnawialnej w gospodarce, a także energii geotermalnej oraz nowoczesne wykorzystanie krajowych zasobów.
trans: We will radically increase the share of renewable energy in the economy, as well as geothermal energy and modern use of domestic resources.

original_text: SDP:n mielestä Suomen on tehtävä konkreettinen polku toimenpiteistä, joilla ilmaston lämpeneminen voidaan pysäyttää puoleentoista asteeseen.
trans: In SDP's opinion, Finland must make a concrete path of measures to stop global warming to one and a half degrees.

original_text: Ενδυνάμωση της συνεργασίας και του συντονισμού των εμπλεκόμενων φορέων κάτω από ενιαίο συντονιστικό φορέα αντιμετώπισης φυσικών καταστροφών.
trans: Strengthening the cooperation and coordination of the involved bodies under a single coordinating body for dealing with natural disasters.

original_text: - Reforçar a diversificação das fontes primárias de energia, contribuindo para aumentar estruturalmente a segurança de abastecimento do País,
trans: - Strengthen the diversification of primary energy sources, contributing to structurally increasing the country's supply security,

original_text: -Work at an EU level to ensure that our international partners keep their commitments to reduce the causes of climate change internationally.
A Labour government will strengthen co-operation in the European Union on environmental issues, including climate change and ozone depletion.
And as we work globally to tackle climate change we recognise the challenge and the opportunity of achieving sustainable development at home.
Dnešní světje propojenější než kdykoli dříve a krize vjedné jeho části, ať už bezpečnostní, ekonomická či klimatická, ovlivňuje celé lidstvo.
trans: Today's world is more interconnected than ever before, and a crisis in any part of it, be it security, economic or climate, affects all of humanity.

original_text: Er man i tvivl, kan man spørge en af de titusinder af danskere, der hver dag gør en forskel for klimaet, alene fordi de passer deres arbejde.
trans: If you are in doubt, you can ask one of the tens of thousands of Danes who make a difference to the climate every day, simply because they do their job.

original_text: España es un país muy vulnerable a los efectos del cambio climático, cuyos principales problemas ambientales se verán agravados por el mismo.
trans: Spain is a country very vulnerable to the effects of climate change, whose main environmental problems will be aggravated by it.

original_text: Hrvaška   prizadevanja   za   izključevanje   Slovenije   iz   Jadrana   (ZERC,   enostranska   izjava   ob   AS,   meja   z   Italijo...)
trans: Croatia's efforts to exclude Slovenia from the Adriatic (ZERC, unilateral statement on the AS, border with Italy...)

original_text: To one mają niekwestionowany wpływ na klimat i jakość powietrza, którym oddychamy, a zarazem są cenną częścią naszego dziedzictwa narodowego.
trans: They have an unquestionable impact on the climate and the quality of the air we breathe, and at the same time are a valuable part of our national heritage.

original_text: Vi ska förbättra och bygga ut såväl det nationella järn- vägsnätet som den regionala spårtrafiken och börja bygga banor för höghastighetståg.
trans: We will improve and expand both the national railway network and the regional rail traffic and start building tracks for high-speed trains.

original_text: Wir müssen aber auch unseren Teil dazu beitragen, dass die Erderwärmung eingebremst wird, indem wir unsere Treibhausgasemissionen reduzieren.
trans: But we also have to do our part to slow down global warming by reducing our greenhouse gas emissions.

original_text: ▪Ojačati i proširiti garancijske sheme države kako bi se smanjio i podijelio rizik s bankarskim sustavom u emisiji novih kredita za likvidnost
trans: ▪Strengthen and expand state guarantee schemes in order to reduce and share the risk with the banking system in issuing new loans for liquidity

original_text: ako aj strednodobé vízie pre posilňovanie konkurencieschopnosti slovenskej ekonomiky a jej udržateľný rast v globálnom konkurenčnom prostredí.
trans: as well as medium-term visions for strengthening the competitiveness of the Slovak economy and its sustainable growth in a global competitive environment.

original_text: al tiempo que promueva el consumo ético y sostenible y las prácticas individuales y colectivas de los consumidores frente al cambio climático.
trans: while promoting ethical and sustainable consumption and the individual and collective practices of consumers in the face of climate change.

original_text: Dabei wird übersehen, dass die Ehe ein über Jahrhunderte gewachsenes juristisches Regelwerk zum Schutz beider Ehepartner sowie der Kinder ist.
trans: What is overlooked is that marriage is a set of legal rules that have developed over centuries to protect both spouses and children.
partyname: Action Committee for Democracy and Pension Justice

original_text: Das muss der Ausgangspunkt für einen Gesellschaftsvertrag zwischen Bäuer*innen, Verbraucher*innen und Politik für Klima- und Naturschutz sein.
trans: This must be the starting point for a social contract between farmers, consumers and politicians for climate and nature conservation.

original_text: Europos žaliasis kursas – Europos Komisijos programa, skirta iki 2050 m. Europai tapti pirmuoju pasaulyje neutralaus poveikio klimatui žemynu.
trans: The European Green Deal is a program of the European Commission for 2050. For Europe to become the world's first climate-neutral continent.

original_text: kujundab Eesti majanduse sajandi keskpaigaks kliimapoliitika põhialustest lähtuvalt konkurentsivõimeliseks vähese süsinikuheitega majanduseks;
trans: shapes the Estonian economy into a competitive economy with low carbon emissions by the middle of the century based on the fundamentals of climate policy;

original_text: Meil tuleb lahendada keeruline väljakutse, kuidas minna üle taastuvenergiale nii, et põlevkivisektori töötajatel säiliks kindlus tuleviku ees.
trans: We have to solve the difficult challenge of how to switch to renewable energy in such a way that the workers of the oil shale sector maintain confidence in the future.

original_text: Mūsų strateginis tikslas – sukurti darnią, draugišką aplinkai, konkurencingą ir didelę pridėtinę vertę kuriančią Lietuvos susisiekimo sistemą.
trans: Our strategic goal is to create a harmonious, environmentally friendly, competitive and high added value Lithuanian transportation system.

original_text: Our record is clear in the RDP and Origin Green programmes, where climate change strategies on farms and in food businesses are well underway.
Statul va reacționa pentru asigurarea coeziunii și solidarității sociale, pentru instituirea unui climat pașnic de conviețuire între cetățeni,
trans: The state will react to ensure social cohesion and solidarity, to establish a peaceful climate of coexistence between citizens,

original_text: V zahteve pri javnih narocilih bomo uvedli "zelene" nadstandarde z dolocitvijo odstotka reciklirane vsebnosti surovin in energetske varcnosti.
trans: We will introduce "green" super-standards into the requirements for public contracts by specifying the percentage of recycled raw material content and energy efficiency.

original_text: Vanaf 2015 koopt de Vlaamse, federale en Europese overheid enkel nog lage emissie auto’s aan (deze auto’s hebben een ecoscore van 72 of meer).
trans: From 2015, the Flemish, federal and European government will only purchase low-emission cars (these cars have an eco score of 72 or more).

original_text: We will invest in increasing the productive capacity of the economy, particularly in terms of ensuring high-levels of high-quality employment.
2 Wij verlagen de lasten op arbeid voor iedereen tot en met een modaal inkomen en verhogen in deze periode het minimumloon tot 14 euro per uur.
trans: 2 We reduce labor costs for everyone up to and including an average income and increase the minimum wage to 14 euros per hour during this period.

original_text: De staat en de gewesten zouden voor hun ecologische en sociale investeringen bij voorrang een beroep moeten doen op de Klimaatinvesteringsbank.
trans: The state and the regions should, as a matter of priority, rely on the Climate Investment Bank for their ecological and social investments.

original_text: De uitstoot van broeikasgassen en ammoniak door onze enorme veestapel gaat ten koste van de natuur en draagt bij aan de opwarming van de aarde.
trans: The emissions of greenhouse gases and ammonia from our enormous livestock are at the expense of nature and contribute to global warming.

original_text: Energija vetra je na razpolago v manjši meri zaradi okoljevarstvenih zahtev, geotermalne energije pa še nismo začeli koristiti v zadostni meri.
trans: Wind energy is available to a lesser extent due to environmental protection requirements, and geothermal energy has not yet started to be used to a sufficient extent.

original_text: Iki 2040 m. pasiekti CO2 neutralumą, kai tas pats teršalų kiekis, kuris išmetamas į aplinką, yra absorbuojamas, kitaip surenkamas ar išvalomas.
trans: Until 2040 to achieve CO2 neutrality when the same amount of pollutants emitted into the environment is absorbed, otherwise collected or cleaned.

original_text: Labour will therefore continue to strongly promote a green agenda that aims to tackle the root causes of climate change as well as its effects.
Las altas tasas de paro que han venido soportando los países europeos han distorsionado la perspectiva con la que debe analizarse tal magnitud.
trans: The high unemployment rates that European countries have been enduring have distorted the perspective with which such magnitude should be analyzed.

trans: Today, if the seriousness of the phenomenon of global warming is debated, the existence of warming caused by greenhouse gases (GHG) is no longer contested.

trans: Advanced societies must be able to integrate their entire society into their human capital and make economic development compatible with environmental protection.

trans: However, the share of revenue from environmental taxes in total tax revenue has fallen in recent years due to inflation and with it the incentive to behave ecologically.

trans: Throughout 2015, COP21 will take place in Paris, in which the commitments of each government regarding mitigation and adaptation to climate change must be defined in detail.

trans: In the interest of our own health, we do everything we can to limit global warming to a maximum of 1.5 degrees Celsius and stop the destruction of nature.

trans: The problem of global warming linked to greenhouse gas emissions, even if no scientific certainty yet exists, is too important to be ignored.

original_text: Nová státní energetická koncepce musí vymezit optimální energetický mix, ve kterém budou zastoupeny všechny druhy energetických zdrojů včetně jaderné energie i obnovitelných zdrojů.
trans: The new state energy concept must define an optimal energy mix in which all types of energy sources will be represented, including nuclear energy and renewable sources.

original_text: Om onze woningen tegen 2050 klimaatneutraal te maken, moeten we naar een renovatieritme van drie procent per jaar gaan (vandaag is dat nauwelijks 1%) en dit voor de komende 20 jaar.
trans: To make our homes climate neutral by 2050, we must move to a renovation rate of three percent per year (today this is barely 1%) for the next 20 years.

trans: Often criticized for its negative effects on natural resources and its role in climate change, agriculture has made enormous progress in recent decades.

original_text: Ubráníme sociální stát a citlivým způsobem dokončíme modernizaci sociálního, zdravotního a důchodového systému s cílem zvýšit jejich efektivnost, motivační působení a dlouhodobou udržitelnost.

trans: In international negotiations, ambitious emission reductions in line with climate science are being pushed for all countries, so that the temperature rise can be stopped below the painful threshold of two degrees.

original_text: Das EEG hat einen intensiven globalen Wettbewerb bei den Anlagenherstellern ausgelöst, die Erzeugungskosten für Solarstrom um 80 % gesenkt und den Stromertrag von Windkraftanlagen enorm erhöht.
trans: The EEG has triggered intense global competition among system manufacturers, reduced the production costs for solar power by 80% and enormously increased the electricity yield from wind turbines.

original_text: Die DP wird mittels „Energiespar-Contracting“ und einer Klimabank die Investitionen der Bürger in eine energiebewusste Altbausanierung oder die Nutzung von erneuerbaren Energien vorfinanzieren.
trans: The DP will use “energy-saving contracting” and a climate bank to pre-finance citizens’ investments in energy-conscious renovation of old buildings or the use of renewable energies.

original_text: É possível, a prazo, reduzir a nossa dependência energética pelo aumento da produção de energias renováveis, remetendo para uma dimensão complementar o consumo com base em combustíveis fósseis.
trans: It is possible, in the long term, to reduce our energy dependence by increasing the production of renewable energy, bringing consumption based on fossil fuels to a complementary dimension.

original_text: Impulsaremos un Plan de Rescate Ecológico con el objetivo de recuperar el conjunto de zonas degradadas y conseguir la restauración ambiental, lo que conllevará la creación de empleo sostenible.
trans: We will promote an Ecological Rescue Plan with the objective of recovering all degraded areas and achieving environmental restoration, which will lead to the creation of sustainable employment.

original_text: In een wereld waarin continenten in plaats van staten de dienst uitmaken en uitdagingen zoals veiligheid, milieu en immigratie landsgrenzen overschrijden, is het cruciaal dat Europa samenwerkt.
trans: In a world where continents rather than states rule and challenges such as security, the environment and immigration cross national borders, it is crucial that Europe works together.

original_text: Pentru a păşi din faza de tranziţie economică în aceea de dezvoltare, susţinem că este indispensabilă stimularea întreprinzătorilor mici şi mijlocii si crearea unui climat favorabil afacerilor,
trans: In order to move from the phase of economic transition to that of development, we argue that it is indispensable to stimulate small and medium-sized entrepreneurs and create a favorable business climate,

trans: Stronger use of RES will increase energy efficiency and reduce greenhouse gas emissions as a consequence of land transport (eg electricity from RES for rail transport).

original_text: Todėl visiškai palaikome JTO lygmeniu priimtą Paryžiaus susitarimą ir iškeltus jo ambicingus tikslus apriboti klimato atšilimą ne daugiau nei 1,5°C laipsnio lyginant su ikipramoniniais laikais.
trans: Therefore, we fully support the Paris Agreement adopted at the UN level and its ambitious goals of limiting climate warming to no more than 1.5°C compared to pre-industrial times.

original_text: Wzrost demograficzny, katastrofy klimatyczne, rosnący popyt na żywność w krajach rozwijających się, popyt na produkty energii odnawialnej, to czynniki określające ekonomiczną politykę rolnictwa
trans: Demographic growth, climate catastrophes, growing demand for food in developing countries, demand for renewable energy products are the factors determining the economic policy of agriculture.

trans: We consider the preservation of functional agriculture, food and forestry to be important for the future, so that it is possible to react flexibly to economic, climatic and other changes.

original_text: Планиране на пространственото развитие на градовете и районите съобразно заплахите и предизвикателствата на глобализацията, демографските промени, климатичните промени и енергийната зависимост.

trans: The biggest obstacle in the field of electricity production is the European Union's climate policy, which imposes obligations to reduce carbon dioxide emissions.

trans: Sustainable, environmentally friendly agriculture ensures food security, better nutrition of society, has a positive impact on public health and improves the quality of life.

original_text: Rozwój  ten  odbywał  się  będzie  poprzez  modernizację,  wspieranie  innowacyjności i efektowności  produkcji,  a także poprzez wsparcie w zakresie pozyskiwania energii ze źródeł odnawialnych.
trans: This development will take place through modernization, supporting innovation and production efficiency, as well as through support in obtaining energy from renewable sources.

trans: This will ensure the development of renewable energy, business investments in more efficient energy consumption, mitigation of climate change under market conditions with the lowest possible state subsidies.

original_text: Vzpostavili bomo povezave med okoljsko, prostorsko in kmetijsko politiko ter politiko varstva potrošnikov in zdrave prehrane, da bi ohranili dobre podlage za skladen trajnostni razvoj Slovenije.
trans: We will establish links between environmental, spatial and agricultural policy, as well as the policy of consumer protection and healthy nutrition, in order to maintain good foundations for the coherent sustainable development of Slovenia.

trans: In the event of vacancy in rural areas, we want municipalities to have more options for an alternative use of existing buildings, even if this conflicts with environmental legislation.

original_text: Človek je namreč v preteklosti s kmetijstvom in gozdarstvom svoje naravno okolje spreminjal in ga prilagajal svojim potrebam in na ta način v stoletjih ustvarjal tako nove materialne kot nove kulturne elemente okolja ter s tem izoblikoval kulturno krajino.
trans: In the past, man changed his natural environment through agriculture and forestry and adapted it to his needs, and in this way over the centuries created both new material and new cultural elements of the environment and thus shaped the cultural landscape.

original_text: Konkurencieschopná energetika, uznávaná doma aj v zahraničí, poskytujúca efektívnu a stabilnú dodávku energií širokým vrstvám spoločnosti pri rešpektovaní dopadov na sociálnu sféru a životné prostredie je dlhodobým cieľom strany SMER – sociálna demokracia.
trans: Competitive energy, recognized at home and abroad, providing an efficient and stable supply of energy to broad layers of society while respecting the impact on the social sphere and the environment is the long-term goal of the SMER party - social democracy.

original_text: Nous pouvons créer de la croissance durable et solide car un grand nombre de difficultés structurelles que rencontre notre économie peuvent être transformées et surmontées alors que de nouvelles opportunités nécessitent un élan clair du futur gouvernement.
trans: We can create sustainable and solid growth because many of the structural difficulties facing our economy can be transformed and overcome while new opportunities require clear impetus from the future government.

original_text: Tijekom desetljeća istraživanja i proizvodnje nafte i plina u Hrvatskoj nisu zabilježeni okolišni incidenti većih razmjera, a kako bi se njihova vjerojatnost svela na minimum, strogo ćemo provoditi preventivne mjere zaštite okoliša, uz neprekidan monitoring.
trans: During the decades of exploration and production of oil and gas in Croatia, no major environmental incidents have been recorded, and in order to reduce their probability to a minimum, we will strictly implement preventive environmental protection measures, with continuous monitoring.

original_text: Pour le PS, ce nécessaire développement ne peut se poursuivre qu’en tenant compte du potentiel réaliste de développement des énergies renouvelables sur notre territoire et de leurs avantages et inconvénients en termes environnementaux, sociaux et économiques.
trans: For the PS, this necessary development can only continue by taking into account the realistic potential for the development of renewable energies in our territory and their advantages and disadvantages in environmental, social and economic terms.

original_text: Zugleich wollen wir jene Staaten in die Pflicht nehmen, die historisch am meisten zur Erderwärmung beigetragen haben, um dem Verantwortungsprinzip im Umweltvölkerrecht Rechnung zu tragen und Heimat- und Aufnahmeländer klimabedingter Migration zu unterstützen.
trans: At the same time, we want to hold those states that have historically contributed the most to global warming accountable to take into account the principle of responsibility in international environmental law and to support home countries and host countries of climate-related migration.

original_text: Da es für das Klima irrelevant ist, an welcher Stelle CO2 eingespart wird, wollen wir bei höheren Zielen künftig die Möglichkeit eröffnen, diese im Sinne einer ökonomisch effizienten Klimapolitik auch über Maßnahmen nach Artikel 6 des Pariser Abkommens zu erreichen.

trans: By significantly supporting the use of renewable energies (biomass, solar and wind energy, geothermal energy), it is necessary to help agricultural farms to partially or fully cover their energy needs with self-produced "green" energy.

original_text: În următorii ani, motoarele creşterii economice vor fi agricultura, investiţiile în infrastructură, inclusiv în cea de comunicaţii, sectorul energetic, inclusiv cel de generator de energie regenerabilă, dar şi investiţiile în creşterea eficienţei energetice.
trans: In the coming years, the engines of economic growth will be agriculture, investments in infrastructure, including communications, the energy sector, including renewable energy generators, but also investments in increasing energy efficiency.

original_text: Reforma současně vytvoří silné ekonomické impulsy pro vývoj a aplikaci nových environmentálně šetrnějších technologií (např. obnovitelných zdrojů energií při výrobě elektřiny a tepla, využití biopaliv, zemního plynu, vodíku a hybridních pohonů v automobilové dopravě).
trans: At the same time, the reform will create strong economic impulses for the development and application of new environmentally friendly technologies (e.g. renewable energy sources in the production of electricity and heat, the use of biofuels, natural gas, hydrogen and hybrid drives in automobile transport).

original_text: Tāpēc arī nākošajos septiņos gados mēs apņemamies godprātīgi strādāt Saeimā un valdībā, lai nodrošinātu ministra Māra Kučinska vadībā izstrādātā Nacionālā attīstības plāna 2007.-2013.gadam izpildi, kurā paustie stratēģiskie uzstādījumi ir arī mūsu partijas pārliecība.
trans: Therefore, in the next seven years as well, we undertake to work in good faith in the Saeima and in the government to ensure the implementation of the National Development Plan for 2007-2013 developed under the leadership of Minister Mārs Kučinskas, in which the strategic settings expressed are also the conviction of our party.

original_text: Austeritatea trebuie promovată de sus şi până jos, acesta fiind singurul climat în care poate fi înfăptuit un adevărat consens naţional, prin atragerea şi promovarea în funcţii de răspundere a tuturor valorilor, capacităţilor şi somităţilor, de care Ţara nu duce lipsă.
trans: Austerity must be promoted from top to bottom, this being the only climate in which a true national consensus can be achieved, by attracting and promoting in positions of responsibility all the values, capacities and personalities, which the country does not lack.

original_text: Dopo il faticoso ingresso nell’Unione monetaria si pensava che il rigore finanziario avrebbe finalmente lasciato spazio alle politiche di piena occupazione, alla creazione di infrastrutture, alla ricerca, all’istruzione, al recupero dell’ambiente e delle aree depresse.
trans: After the arduous entry into the Monetary Union, it was thought that financial rigor would finally give way to full employment policies, the creation of infrastructure, research, education, the recovery of the environment and depressed areas.

trans: European emissions trading will continue to be the main instrument for decarbonizing this sector and a strong driver of innovation, with it being essential to protect sectors exposed to carbon leakage and create specific conditions for small installations.

trans: In the face of climate urgency, the right and the PS defend that the priorities and pace of the energy transition remain subordinated to the private interests of the administration and shareholders of EDP and Galp, major beneficiaries of the current energy and mobility model.

trans: In this context, the Walloon territory has been divided into 15 hydrographic sub-basins which now constitute the management units for setting quality objectives, river contracts, fish management, drainage and wastewater sanitation. .

original_text: A tous les niveaux de pouvoir, de l’échelon international jusqu’au niveau local, le PS propose de :contribuer à la conclusion d’un accord climatique mondial contraignant en2015 en vue de limiter l’augmentation de la température globale à Maximum 1,5°C à 2°C et veiller au succès du sommet de Paris en 2015 ;
trans: At all levels of power, from the international level to the local level, the PS proposes to: contribute to the conclusion of a binding global climate agreement in 2015 with a view to limiting the increase in global temperature to Maximum 1, 5°C to 2°C and ensure the success of the Paris summit in 2015;

original_text: Wir werden multilaterales Handeln wiederbeleben und stärken, auch in Partnerschaft mit der Zivilgesellschaft und Nichtregierungsorganisationen, denn Pandemien, globale Wirtschaft-, Finanz- und Entwicklungskrisen sowie die Folgen der Erderwärmung sind Herausforderung, die nur gemeinsam gelöst werden können.
trans: We will revive and strengthen multilateral action, also in partnership with civil society and non-governmental organizations, because pandemics, global economic, financial and development crises and the consequences of global warming are challenges that can only be solved together.

trans: A unified state energy concept, ensuring the Czech Republic's energy security with a decisive share of nuclear electricity production (promote the start of the construction of the 3rd and 4th blocks of the Temelín NPP, the modernization of the Dukovany NPP) with an increase in the share of renewable energy sources and a reduction in the energy intensity of both production and consumption.

original_text: Sozial­ und klimagerechte Wirtschafts­politik: Wir müssen den Umbau zu einer weitgehend kohlendioxidfreien, energie- und ressourcensparenden Wirtschaft und Infrastruktur so schnell wie möglich schaffen, um überhaupt die Chance zu haben, das1,5-Grad-Ziel bei der Begrenzung der Erderwärmung noch zu erreichen.
trans: Socially and climate-friendly economic policy: We must convert to a largely carbon dioxide-free, energy- and resource-saving economy and infrastructure as quickly as possible in order to have any chance of achieving the 1.5 degree target for limiting global warming.

original_text: España es uno de los países con mayor patrimonio cultural del mundo, en el que acuden millones de turistas todos los años atraídos por su gastronomía, cultura, patrimonio artístico, clima y los diversos atractivos que posee nuestro país, convirtiéndolo en uno de los principales destinos turísticos del mundo.

original_text: Le paiement est désormais lié au respect de normes en matière d’environnement, de sécurité alimentaire, de santé animale et végétale, ainsi qu’à l’exigence du maintien des terres agricoles dans des conditions agronomiques et environnementales satisfaisantes : c’est ce que l’on appelle la « conditionnalité ».
trans: Payment is now linked to compliance with standards regarding the environment, food safety, animal and plant health, as well as the requirement to maintain agricultural land in satisfactory agronomic and environmental conditions: this is what this is called “conditionality”.

original_text: Posebnu važnost, posebice u urbanim prostorima, treba pridavati održivosti prometnog sustava, sigurnosti i nadzoru svih vidova prometa, smanjenju emisije plinova, energetskoj učinkovitosti, prelasku na nova (alternativna) goriva i nove pogonske sustave, a sve u cilju ekološke zaštite prostora u kojem živimo.
trans: Special importance, especially in urban areas, should be attached to the sustainability of the transport system, safety and supervision of all types of transport, reduction of gas emissions, energy efficiency, transition to new (alternative) fuels and new drive systems, all with the aim of ecological protection of the space in which we live .

trans: The GREEN DEVELOPMENT OF CROATIA program is a production and employment development program that includes investments in the construction of waste management systems, water protection, renewable energy sources, green transport, ecological agriculture, forestry, sustainable tourism, as well as energy-efficient construction.

trans: Global warming with its negative consequences, the financial and energy crises and, last but not least, the ongoing social crisis show the limits of a globally unregulated economic model that puts natural resources and the living conditions of current and future generations at risk worldwide.

original_text: Les habitants de la planète doivent impérativement réduire leurs émissions de carbone de 25 à 40 % d’ici 2050 afin de pouvoir limiter le réchauffement climatique à 2 °C et d’éviter les conséquences catastrophiques des dérèglements climatiques pour la vie sur terre, le développement socio-économique, et la production agricole.
trans: The inhabitants of the planet must absolutely reduce their carbon emissions by 25 to 40% by 2050 in order to limit global warming to 2°C and avoid the catastrophic consequences of climate change for life on earth and development. socio-economic, and agricultural production.

original_text: Invertiremos, a través del Fondo Nacional de Eficiencia Energética y otros mecanismos, más de 1.800 millones de euros en los próximos 4 años y realizaremos acciones que permitirán cumplir con los objetivos de ahorro energético a 2020, lo que supondrá un ahorro equivalente al consumo de los hogares españoles durante todo un año.
trans: We will invest, through the National Energy Efficiency Fund and other mechanisms, more than 1,800 million euros in the next 4 years and we will carry out actions that will allow us to meet the energy savings objectives for 2020, which will mean savings equivalent to the consumption of the Spanish homes for a whole year.

original_text: Preto budeme presadzovať medzinárodnú environmentálnu zodpovednosť v rámci organizácií, ktorých je Slovenská republika členom, ale rovnako aj zdôrazňovať hodnotu našej krajiny v európskom priestore, ako významného zachycovača emisií, krajiny s vysokou lesnatosťou a budeme sa usilovať profitovať na výhodách z toho vyplývajúcich.
trans: Therefore, we will promote international environmental responsibility within the organizations of which the Slovak Republic is a member, but also emphasize the value of our country in the European space, as an important emitter of emissions, a country with a high forest cover, and we will strive to profit from the benefits resulting from this.

original_text: Οι κυριότεροι στόχοι μας στην κατεύθυνση της ενσωμάτωσης της περιβαλλοντικής διάστασης στον τομέα των μεταφορών συνδυάζονται με στόχους για τη μείωση των ατμοσφαιρικών ρύπων και με το Εθνικό Πρόγραμμα για τη Μείωση των Εκπομπών Φαινομένου του Θερμοκηπίου, καθώς επίσης και με το γενικότερο στόχο της βελτίωσης της ποιότητας ζωής.
trans: Our main objectives in the direction of the integration of the environmental dimension in the transport sector are combined with objectives for the reduction of atmospheric pollutants and with the National Program for the Reduction of Greenhouse Effect Emissions, as well as with the general objective of improving the quality of life .

original_text: Outra negociação conduzida pelo governo foi com o FMI:  ao antecipar o pagamento desta dívida o que se justificava considerando o juro elevado que envolvia -, o governo aceitou condições prejudiciais, como submeter próximas emissões de obrigações a prazos alargados, em vez de beneficiar dos juros negativos em prazos mais curtos.
trans: Another negotiation conducted by the government was with the IMF: by anticipating the payment of this debt, which was justified considering the high interest it involved, the government accepted harmful conditions, such as subjecting future bond issues to longer terms, instead of benefiting from the interest. negative in shorter time frames.

original_text: W sprawie katastrofy smoleńskiej rząd utworzony przez Prawo i Sprawiedliwość podejmie wszelkie ko-nieczne działania – zarówno w relacjach z Rosją, jak i na arenie międzynarodowej – aby doprowadzić do rzetelnego i wszechstronnego wyjaśnienia przyczyn tej tragedii, niemającej precedensu w nowoczesnych dziejach politycznych świata.
trans: In the case of the Smolensk disaster, the government formed by Law and Justice will take all necessary actions - both in relations with Russia and in the international arena - to lead to a reliable and comprehensive explanation of the causes of this tragedy, which has no precedent in the modern political history of the world.

original_text: În spiritul unor documente şi legi, precum Declaraţia Europeană a Drepturilor Omului, Constituţia României, Carta Limbilor Regionale sau Minoritare, Declaraţia Uniunii Internaţionale a Jurnaliştilor, Acordul internaţional referitor la televiziuni cu raza de emisie peste hotare, UDMR susţine ferm libertatea cuvântului şi a presei,
trans: In the spirit of documents and laws, such as the European Declaration of Human Rights, the Constitution of Romania, the Charter of Regional or Minority Languages, the Declaration of the International Union of Journalists, the International Agreement on Television Broadcasting Abroad, UDMR firmly supports freedom of speech and the press,

original_text: Wir eröffnen den technologischen Spitzenfeldern der Zukunft in Deutschland die besten Entwicklungschancen: Bio- und Gentechnologie, Materialforschung, Medizintechnik und Optik, Nanotechnologie, Mechatronik und Verkehrstechnologie, Luft- und Raumfahrttechnik, Informations- und Kommunikationstechnologie, Energie- und Umwelttechnik.
trans: We open up the best development opportunities for the leading technological fields of the future in Germany: bio- and genetic technology, materials research, medical technology and optics, nanotechnology, mechatronics and transport technology, aerospace technology, information and communication technology, energy and environmental technology.

original_text: 5.  Smanjenje zaduženosti -Smanjenje zaduženosti građana s 42% BDP-a na razinu prosjeka (33%) u bivšim tranzicijskim zemljama omogućit će građanima lakši život i poboljšati njihova ekonomska očekivanja (zapošljavanje i životni standard) zbog čega će se opća klima promijeniti i pružiti potporu dugoročnom i održivom ekonomskom rastu
trans: 5. Reduction of indebtedness -Reducing the indebtedness of citizens from 42% of GDP to the average level (33%) in former transition countries will enable citizens to live easier and improve their economic expectations (employment and standard of living), due to which the general climate will change and provide support for long-term and sustainable economic growth

trans: the inability of the system to provide solutions to a series of essential challenges of our time (global warming, increase in inequalities and poverty, employment crisis, etc.) and the proven deficits, at several levels, in management of the public good question the quality of institutions and the state apparatus;

original_text: Se aproveitarmos o potencial endógeno das fontes renováveis de energia, se adotarmos exigentes padrões de eficiência energética, se promovermos uma mobilidade susten-tável e se apostarmos, desde já, nas tecnologias limpas que permi-tem tudo isto, estaremos certamente em melhores condições para competir no mercado global de amanhã.
trans: If we take advantage of the endogenous potential of renewable energy sources, if we adopt demanding energy efficiency standards, if we promote sustainable mobility and if we invest, from now on, on clean technologies that allow all of this, we will certainly be in better conditions to compete in the global market of tomorrow.

original_text: Selleks, et stimuleerida jäätmete sorteerimist ja keskkonnahoidlikumaid jäätmekäitlusviise ning tagada kohalikele omavalitsustele jäätmehoolduse korraldamiseks püsivam rahastus, töötame uue keskkonnatasude raamkava koostamise käigus välja Euroopa Liidu jäätmehierarhiast sõltuva jäätmekäitluse keskkonnatasudega maksustamise mudeli.
trans: In order to stimulate waste sorting and more environmentally friendly ways of waste management and to ensure more permanent funding for local governments to organize waste management, we are developing a model for taxing waste management with environmental fees depending on the waste hierarchy of the European Union during the preparation of the new framework plan for environmental fees.

original_text: Prechod  na nové trvalo udržateľné sociálne, trhové, inteligentnejšie a ekologickejšie hospodárstvo musí byť založený na inovačných postupoch, lepšom využívaní zdrojov a na znalostiach a musí byť sprevádzaný vytváraním nových pracovných príležitostí, bojom proti rastúcej nezamestnanosti a bojom proti chudobe a sociálnemu vylúčeniu.
trans: The transition to a new sustainable social, market, smarter and more ecological economy must be based on innovative practices, better use of resources and knowledge and must be accompanied by the creation of new job opportunities, the fight against growing unemployment and the fight against poverty and social exclusion.

original_text: Os impactos das alterações climáticas, visíveis e comprovados pelo último relatório do IPCC (Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change), compele-nos a equacionar modos mais eficazes e céleres de cooperação civil, política, e mesmo militar, pois os efeitos potencialmente devastadores de fenómenos extremos são hoje uma crua realidade.
trans: The impacts of climate change, visible and proven by the latest IPCC (Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change) report, compel us to consider more effective and rapid forms of civil, political, and even military cooperation, as the potentially devastating effects of extreme phenomena are today a harsh reality.

trans: Protection of all architecturally and urban-planningly significant settlements and residential complexes by establishing morphological conditions and building rules with priority on the maintenance of public infrastructure and the gradual undergrounding of electrical networks on the islands, traditional settlements and landscapes of particular natural beauty.

trans: ▪strengthen the system of state guarantees for loans to finance strategic investments in changing the production structure of the economy towards manufacturing industries, especially in digital technologies, the ITC sector, pharmaceutical and immune production, the agricultural and food sector, equipment for renewable energy sources and the circular economy

original_text: Reforçar as competências e a capacitação das Administrações de Região Hidrográfica para uma maior dinâmica de intervenção ao nível das bacias hidrográficas, sobretudo no que se refere ao planeamento, ordenamento, aproveitamento e monitorização das águas e dos seus usos, aumentando a sua capacidade de apreciação técnica e de supervisão;
trans: Strengthen the skills and capacity building of Hydrographic Region Administrations for a greater dynamic of intervention at the level of river basins, especially with regard to planning, ordering, exploitation and monitoring of waters and their uses, increasing their capacity for technical appreciation and supervision;

original_text: Assim, beneficiando sobretudo do programa de emissão monetária pelo BCE desde 2016 e se não surgirem novas dificuldades, a gestão de dívida que o governo tem seguido poderá permitir uma ligeira redução do valor presente da dívida pública e da externa para 100% e 79% do PIB (a partir dos valores presentes de 11,8% e 84%, respetivamente).
trans: Therefore, benefiting mainly from the ECB's monetary issuance program since 2016 and if no new difficulties arise, the debt management that the government has followed could allow a slight reduction in the present value of public and external debt to 100% and 79% of the GDP (from present values ​​of 11.8% and 84%, respectively).

original_text: Būtina aiškiai sutvarkyti įstatyminę bazę, reglamentuojančią valstybės veiksmus krizių atveju pritaikyti ją prie šiandieninių iššūkių, tokių kaip branduolinių ar cheminių katastrofų, karinės atakos grėsmė, panaikinti nuostatas, sukuriančias priešpriešas atsakingų institucijų veikloje, sukurti visuomenės informavimo apie grėsmes sistemą.
trans: It is necessary to clearly organize the legal framework regulating the actions of the state in case of crises, to adapt it to today's challenges, such as nuclear or chemical catastrophes, the threat of a military attack, to abolish the provisions that create contradictions in the activities of the responsible institutions, to create a system of informing the public about threats.

original_text: Nous mettrons en œuvre un plan de transition écologique de l'agriculture en vue de faire de l'agriculture française un modèle d'agriculture de qualité, sans OGM, largement autonome en ressources non renouvelables, relocalisée, participant à la santé publique des consommateurs et contribuant à la lutte contre le réchauffement climatique.
trans: We will implement an ecological transition plan for agriculture with a view to making French agriculture a model of quality agriculture, without GMOs, largely self-sufficient in non-renewable resources, relocated, participating in the public health of consumers and contributing to the fight against global warming.

original_text: Tačiau dėl žmogaus veiklos, kurios šalutiniu rezultatu neretai yra buveinių̨ sunaikinimas, gamtinių išteklių̨ išeikvojimas, invazinis svetimų rūšių̨ išplitimas ir klimato kaita, beveik ketvirčiui laukinių rūšių̨ gresia pavojus išnykti, o didžioji dalis ekosistemų̨ yra tokios blogos būkles, kad nebeįstengia atlikti svarbių funkcijų̨.
trans: However, due to human activities, which often result in the destruction of habitats, the depletion of natural resources, the invasive spread of alien species, and climate change, almost a quarter of wild species are at risk of extinction, and the majority of ecosystems are in such a bad state that they are no longer able to perform important functions.

trans: Community Directive 85/337/EEC (Council Directive of 27 June 1985, Assessment of the environmental impact of certain public and private projects) introduces in Europe, following the US experience of 1969, Impact Assessment as a tool for Analysis of the potential impacts produced by anthropic matrices.

original_text: Una vez estabilizados los principales sectores energéticos, ahora es el momento de construir una política energética que mire a largo plazo, aproveche al máximo nuestros recursos, impulse la competitividad y la creación de empleo, haga la energía más accesible para todos y colabore en la lucha contra el cambio climático de forma eficien-te.
trans: Once the main energy sectors have been stabilized, now is the time to build an energy policy that looks at the long term, makes the most of our resources, boosts competitiveness and job creation, makes energy more accessible for all and collaborates in the fight against climate change efficiently.

original_text: -Rendre les normes de l’Organisation Internationale du Travail relatives au travail décent et les principes directeurs de l’OCDE à l’égard des multinationales contraignants pour garantir leurs responsabilités en matière de protection de l'environnement, de respect des normes fondamentales du travail et de promotion de la diversité culturelle.
trans: -Make the standards of the International Labor Organization relating to decent work and the guiding principles of the OECD with regard to multinationals binding to guarantee their responsibilities in terms of environmental protection, respect for fundamental labor standards and promotion of cultural diversity.

original_text: Le réchauffement climatique et ses  effets néfastes, la crise financière et énergétique, ainsi que la crise alimentaire mondiale persistante illustrent les limites d‘un modèle économique mondial non réglementé, qui compromet les ressources naturelles et les conditions  de  vie  des  générations  actuelles  et  futures  à  l‘échelle  mondiale.
trans: Global warming and its harmful effects, the financial and energy crisis, as well as the persistent global food crisis illustrate the limits of an unregulated global economic model, which compromises natural resources and the living conditions of current and future generations. global scale.

original_text: Ob mit Dekarbonisierungsstrategien für Unternehmen in öffentlicher Hand, durch Umstellung der Fuhrparks von Ministerien, Landesregierungen und Gemeinden, oder mit der regionalen, biologischen und gesunden Verpflegung von Schulen oder Krankenhäusern: Die öffentliche Hand ist sich ihrer Klima-Vorbildwirkung bewusst und nimmt sie konsequent wahr.
trans: Whether with decarbonization strategies for publicly owned companies, by converting the vehicle fleets of ministries, state governments and municipalities, or with regional, organic and healthy catering for schools or hospitals: the public sector is aware of its role model effect on the climate and consistently takes it into account.

original_text: Plan  mora  predvideti  nenehno  spremljanje  zdravstvenega  stanja  prebivalstva  s  pomočjo  epidemiološkega spremljanja epidemij z analizami vplivov okolja na zdravje ljudi, ter s spremljanjem  zdravja  zaposlenih, groženj  za  zdravje  zaradi  podnebnih  sprememb  ter  povečanega  cestnega  prometa in škodljivih učinkov zdravstvene oskrbe.
trans: The plan must provide for continuous monitoring of the health status of the population by means of epidemiological monitoring of epidemics with analyzes of environmental impacts on human health, as well as monitoring the health of employees, threats to health due to climate change and increased road traffic and the harmful effects of medical care.

original_text: Conform principiului egalităţii de şanse, statul, prin autorităţile sale competente, să asigure ca minorităţile etnice să poată înfiinţa şi opera studiouri de radio şi televiziune private, comerciale şi confesionale şi să aibă acces direct la emisiunile de radio şi televiziune difuzate în alte ţări în limba etniei în cauză;
trans: According to the principle of equal opportunities, the state, through its competent authorities, must ensure that ethnic minorities can establish and operate private, commercial and confessional radio and television studios and have direct access to radio and television broadcasts broadcast in other countries in the language the ethnic group in question;

trans: Thanks to their uniqueness, civic institutions can, by activating society's resources of patriotic creativity and responsibility for the common good, by developing community motivations and attitudes of citizens, effectively cooperate with the administration for the public good and complement many classic functions of the state.

trans: A government guarantee must ensure that tenders for high-value investments that use state, local government, and especially EU funds contain a preferential option that promotes the recruitment of labor from the immediate surroundings of the investment or from the nearest disadvantaged micro-regions.

trans: place at the heart of the future global agreement the objective of a just and sustainable transition towards a society that emits few greenhouse gases and consumes fewer raw materials; which requires ensuring social support for the most vulnerable and workers and guaranteeing economic activity in order to make this change acceptable;

original_text: La legge deve prevedere l’istituzione di un Osservatorio sul Governo del Territorio, con la partecipazione delle Regioni, che raccolga e fornisca elementi di conoscenza e indicazioni per la messa in sicurezza del territorio e per la definizione di misure che innalzino la qualità della vita nel territorio urbanizzato e in quello agricolo e naturale.
trans: The law must provide for the establishment of an Observatory on Territorial Government, with the participation of the Regions, which collects and provides elements of knowledge and indications for the safety of the territory and for the definition of measures that raise the quality of life in the urbanized territory and agricultural and natural territory.

original_text: Om opgewassen te zijn tegen de grote ecologische uitdagingen van vandaag zoals de opwarming van de aarde, het verlies aan biodiversiteit en het verlies aan natuurlijke hulpbronnen, de verspreiding van vervuilende stoffen ten koste van onze gezondheid, is er nood aan een ecologische ommekeer in onze wijze van produceren en consumeren, zonder weerga.
trans: To meet today's major ecological challenges such as global warming, the loss of biodiversity and natural resources, the spread of pollutants to the detriment of our health, there is a need for an ecological change in our way of of producing and consuming, unprecedented.

original_text: Ante el horizonte de la próxima Cumbre de París 2015 C0P21, Conferencia de Naciones Unidas sobre el Cambio Climático, desde Ciudadanos-Cs nos sumamos a la lucha firme contra el cambio climático y el calentamiento global, comprometiéndonos a convertir dicha lucha en un objetivo primordial de nuestros programas medioambientales, sociales y económicos.
trans: Faced with the horizon of the upcoming Paris 2015 C0P21 Summit, United Nations Conference on Climate Change, from Ciudadanos-Cs we join the firm fight against climate change and global warming, committing to turn this fight into a primary objective of our environmental, social and economic programs.

original_text: Európa fejlettebb országaiban már ma is az energiatakarékosság elősegítését, az energiahatékonyság növelését, a megújulóenergia-ipart, a hulladék keletkezésének megelőzését, a hulladék-és a másodnyersanyag-hasznosítást, illetve a természetkímélő agrártermelést magában foglaló zöldgazdaság a legnagyobb munkahelyteremtő potenciállal rendelkező ágazat.
trans: Even today, in the more developed countries of Europe, the green economy, which includes the promotion of energy saving, the increase of energy efficiency, the renewable energy industry, the prevention of waste generation, the utilization of waste and secondary raw materials, and nature-friendly agricultural production, is the sector with the greatest job creation potential.

original_text: Inoltre, nelle gare di assegnazione dei servizi esternalizzati di comuni e loro partecipate, privilegiare i soggetti che propongono l’uso di veicoli elettrici a emissioni nulle e veicoli ibridi plug-in ad elevata autonomia in elettrico, anche in riferimento al Decreto Legislativo 3 marzo 2011 n. 24 relativo alla valutazione economica delle emissioni.
trans: Furthermore, in the tenders for the assignment of outsourced services of municipalities and their subsidiaries, give priority to entities that propose the use of zero-emission electric vehicles and plug-in hybrid vehicles with high electric autonomy, also in reference to the Legislative Decree of 3 March 2011 n. 24 relating to the economic evaluation of emissions.

original_text: Por exemplo, no que diz respeito ao clima, este é um sistema complexo e determinante para a continuidade da presença de animais no Planeta, existindo hoje um consenso científico consistente de que se tem vindo a verificar o aquecimento global do Planeta em consequência, precisamente, das mudanças climáticas que têm ocorrido decorrente da acçao humana.
trans: For example, with regard to climate, this is a complex system that is decisive for the continued presence of animals on the Planet, and today there is a consistent scientific consensus that global warming of the Planet has been occurring as a result, precisely, climate changes that have occurred as a result of human action.

trans: Portugal became at the forefront of all relevant European agendas, from the deepening of the Economic and Monetary Union to the reception of refugees or the energy transition to the defense of the Rule of Law; and all multilateral agendas, from the Sustainable Development Goals to the Climate Agenda and the Global Compact on Migration.

Rédigé par un large panel de scientifiques, d'anciens responsables politiques et d'économistes, et publié en janvier 2005, le rapport Meeting the Climate Challenge fixe à dix ans, « voire peutêtre moins », le point de nonretour climatique audelà duquel les rejets de gaz à effet de serre vont entraîner une hausse de température désastreuse pour la planète.
trans: Written by a large panel of scientists, former political leaders and economists, and published in January 2005, the Meeting the Climate Challenge report sets at ten years, "or perhaps less", the climatic point of no return beyond which emissions of greenhouse gases will lead to a disastrous rise in temperature for the planet.

original_text: Međutim, ova pandemija nosi i barem još jednu jasnu poruku – nova struktura hrvatskoga gospodarstva i proizvodnje mora biti daleko više nego do sada usmjerena ostvarivanju samodostatnosti, poglavito u hrani, energiji, vodoopskrbi, medicinskoj opremi, sigurnosnoj opremi, imunološkoj zaštiti, opremi za kružno gospodarstvo, zaštitu okoliša i zelenu ekonomiju.

original_text: El cambio de escenario energético mundial con respecto a la seguridad de abastecimiento y al cambio climático, obliga a que la política económica y la política energética contemplen la sostenibilidad energética no como un sobrecoste sino como una inversión beneficiosa para el país, cuyas externalidades van a contribuir a mejorar la renta nacional y la renta disponible.
trans: The change in the global energy scenario with respect to security of supply and climate change forces economic policy and energy policy to consider energy sustainability not as an extra cost but as a beneficial investment for the country, whose externalities will contribute to improve national income and disposable income.

original_text: Vår klimatpolitik tar miljöfrågorna på det stora allvar de förtjänar. Den globala uppvärmningen måste bromsas och Sverige har ett ansvar som föregångsland. Världsledande grön forskning och teknologisk innovation ger tillsammans med effektiva politiska lösningar konkreta resultat. Vi slösar inte bort pengarna på symbolpolitik, utan använder dem där klimatnyttan är störst.
trans: Our climate policy takes environmental issues as seriously as they deserve. Global warming must be slowed down and Sweden has a responsibility as a leading country. World-leading green research and technological innovation together with effective political solutions produce concrete results. We do not waste the money on symbolic politics, but use it where the climate benefit is greatest.

trans: The already observed intensification of extreme climatic phenomena, namely forest fires, heat waves, droughts, floods, sea and land storms, implies important changes in terms of territorial planning, coastal defense structures, sediment recharge to combat coastal erosion and displacement of populations living in vulnerable areas.

trans: We are aware that climate change is generated by global warming caused by the so-called greenhouse gases, which are carbon dioxide, tropospheric ozone (not stratospheric), methane, nitrous oxide, chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs), hydrofluorocarbons (HCFCs), perfluorocarbons (PFC), sulfur hexafluoride, carbon tetrachloride, carbon monoxide, and methyl chloroform.

original_text: La costa española es susceptible de verse afectada por varios riesgos (inundación, erosión, cambio climático, vertidos de hidrocarburos, etc.), y aunque la probabilidad de otros fenómenos como los tsunamis es baja, las zonas más susceptibles de verse afectadas cuentan con una altísima densidad de población, infraestructuras y actividad turística, lo cual eleva de forma considerable los posibles impactos.
trans: The Spanish coast is susceptible to being affected by various risks (flood, erosion, climate change, hydrocarbon spills, etc.), and although the probability of other phenomena such as tsunamis is low, the areas most likely to be affected have a very high population density, infrastructure and tourist activity, which considerably increases the possible impacts.
