original_text: Esta Unidade de Missão, de iniciativa pública, mas com participação e gestão privada de caráter técnico e científico, beneficiará de uma dotação financeira específica inscrita no Orçamento do Estado e contará com um fórum onde participarão representantes de todos os atores envolvidos e os próprios destinatários, de forma a garantir o diálogo, auscultação permanentes e a própria avaliação das ações, entretanto em curso.
trans: This Mission Unit, a public initiative, but with private participation and management of a technical and scientific nature, will benefit from a specific financial allocation included in the State Budget and will have a forum where representatives of all actors involved and the recipients themselves will participate, in order to guarantee dialogue, permanent consultation and the evaluation of the actions, which are currently underway.

original_text: Per lungo tempo gli slogan della “finanza sana”, della rimozione dei “lacci” che impediscono lo sviluppo imprenditoriale, del conflitto tra “padri spendaccioni e figli diseredati”, della condanna dello “Stato assistenziale” hanno dominato la scena politica pressoché indisturbati, mostrando una forza dialettica e una capacità di incidenza sull’azione di governo di gran lunga superiori a quelle delle visioni antagoniste.
trans: For a long time the slogans of "healthy finance", of the removal of the "snares" that impede entrepreneurial development, of the conflict between "spendthrift fathers and disinherited children", of the condemnation of the "welfare state" dominated the political scene almost undisturbed, showing a dialectical force and a capacity to influence government action far superior to those of antagonistic visions.

original_text: Toute inaction pour endiguer le réchauffement climatique se traduirait par « des dérèglements de l'activité économique et sociale (...) d'une ampleur similaire à ceux qui ont suivi les plus grandes guerres et la grande dépression de la première moitié du XXe siècle », a prévenu Sir Nicholas Stern, ancien économiste en chef de la Banque mondiale, à l'occasion de la publication, en octobre 2006, du rapport qui porte son nom.
trans: Any inaction to stem global warming would result in “disruptions in economic and social activity (...) of a magnitude similar to those which followed the greatest wars and the great depression of the first half of the 20th century », warned Sir Nicholas Stern, former chief economist of the World Bank, on the occasion of the publication, in October 2006, of the report which bears his name.

original_text: Učinkovito ćemo koristiti različite instrumente financiranja kao što su: program InvestEU, Povezivanje Europe (projekti od zajedničkog interesa), fondovi za istraživanje i razvoj, EU fondovi, instrumenti financiranja pametnih mreža (ERA-Net Plus), program Obzor 2020 (H2020), Europska investicijska banka (EIB), Europski energetski program za oporavak (EEPR), Instrument za povezivanje Europe – Energetika (CEF-E), NER 300 i Eurogia+.
trans: We will effectively use different financing instruments such as: InvestEU program, Connecting Europe (projects of common interest), research and development funds, EU funds, smart grid financing instruments (ERA-Net Plus), Horizon 2020 program (H2020), European investment bank (EIB), European Energy Program for Recovery (EEPR), Connecting Europe Facility - Energy (CEF-E), NER 300 and Eurogia+.

original_text: Orientarea investiţiilor în funcţie de priorităţile ce rezultă din strategiile de dezvoltare economico-socială a României şi programele de participare eficientă a ţării noastre la schimburile economice internaţionale (construcţii de autostrăzi, modernizări căi ferate, containerizare şi transporturi combinate, telecomunicaţii, industria energetică, construcţii de maşini, chimie şi petrochimie, agricultură şi industrie alimentară, turism).
trans: The orientation of investments according to the priorities resulting from Romania's economic and social development strategies and the programs for the effective participation of our country in international economic exchanges (construction of highways, modernization of railways, containerization and combined transport, telecommunications, energy industry, construction of machines, chemistry and petrochemicals, agriculture and food industry, tourism).
partyname: Party of Social Democracy of Romania

original_text: Zagotavljanje varnosti prebivalk in prebivalcev pred vsemi vrstami in oblikami sodobne ogroženosti  (zunanje  vojaške  in  nevojaške  grožnje,  terorizem,  povečana  kriminaliteta  in  organiziran  kriminal,  okoljske  grožnje,  vključno  s  posledicami  podnebnih  sprememb,  ekonomske  grožnje,  naraščajoča  energetska odvisnost) bi moralo temeljiti na novi oceni ogroženosti in na njej vzpostavljeni strukturi  varnostno-obrambnega sistema.
trans: Ensuring the safety of residents against all types and forms of modern threats (external military and non-military threats, terrorism, increased criminality and organized crime, environmental threats, including the consequences of climate change, economic threats, growing energy dependence) should be based on a new threat assessment and the structure of the security-defense system established on it.

original_text: En ese sentido, en un mundo en crisis económica, alimentaria y ecológica, un mundo finito y con recursos limitados, es indispensable abordar la cuestión del decrecimiento, es decir, decrecimiento en el consumo de recursos naturales (materias primas y energía) y en la emisión de residuos y gases de efecto invernadero, que se combine al mismo tiempo con el crecimiento en torno a la creación y refuerzo de los servicios públicos y el desarrollo humano.
trans: In this sense, in a world in economic, food and ecological crisis, a finite world with limited resources, it is essential to address the issue of degrowth, that is, decrease in the consumption of natural resources (raw materials and energy) and in the emission of waste and greenhouse gases, which is combined at the same time with growth around the creation and reinforcement of public services and human development.

original_text: a  v rámci posilnenia stability dôchodkového systému a jeho finančnej udržateľnosti  zreformovanie 1. dôchodkového piliera zreálnením sadzieb odvodov do Sociálnej poisťovne a posilnením solidarity na úkor zásluhovosti (napr. stanovenie maximálnej výšky dôchodku, konečné určenie výšky dôchodku dovŕšením dôchodkového veku, obmedzenie nesystémových prvkov v 1. dôchodkovom pilieri – vianočný príspevok, spravodlivé valorizovanie dôchodkov – o pevnú sumu).
trans: and within the framework of strengthening the stability of the pension system and its financial sustainability, reforming the 1st pension pillar by realizing the rates of contributions to the Social Insurance Fund and strengthening solidarity at the expense of merit (e.g. determining the maximum amount of the pension, the final determination of the amount of the pension upon reaching the retirement age, limiting non-systemic elements in the 1st pension pillars - Christmas allowance, fair valuation of pensions - by a fixed amount).

original_text: Sostituire parzialmente il carbone che utilizziamo in Italia con i nostri rifiuti trasformati e selezionati, proibire l’esportazione degli stessi all’estero, favorire l’utilizzo del Combustibile Solido Secondario (combustibile generato dalla trasformazione dei rifiuti) cioè combustibile di qualità presso tutte le centrali di produzione energetica che utilizzano il carbone e tutte le cementerie, come previsto dal D.M. n.22/13 del Ministero dell’Ambiente.
trans: Partially replace the coal we use in Italy with our transformed and selected waste, prohibit the export of the same abroad, encourage the use of Secondary Solid Fuel (fuel generated by the transformation of waste) i.e. quality fuel at all power plants of energy production that use coal and all cement plants, as required by the Ministerial Decree. n.22/13 of the Ministry of the Environment.

original_text: Pielę-gnujemy struktury współpracy już istniejące, ta-kie jak wspomniana współpraca wyszehradzka  czy  Trójkąt  Weimarski,  ale  również  tworzymy  i  wzmacniamy  nowe  związki  –  czy  to  formal-ne,  czy  nieformalne  –  co  nasz  rząd  udowodnił  choćby  przy  okazji  powoływania  Partnerstwa  Wschodniego,  negocjacji  nad  pakietem  klima-tycznym,  Strategią  2020  czy  obecnie  podczas  wstępnych negocjacji dotyczących unijnego bu-dżetu na lata 2014–2020
trans: We cultivate existing cooperation structures, such as the above-mentioned Visegrad cooperation or the Weimar Triangle, but we also create and strengthen new relationships - both formal and informal - which our government has proven, for example, when establishing the Eastern Partnership and negotiating the package climate, Strategy 2020 or currently during the preliminary negotiations regarding the EU budget for 2014–2020

original_text: A mudança do paradigma que o PS pretende levar a cabo, no contexto da concretização dos objetivos de descarbonização e transição energética, de transformação do paradigma de produção e consumo e de adaptação e valorização do território, impõe uma forte aposta no conhecimento, na informação e na educação ambiental, enquanto fatores decisivos para a alteração de comportamentos, traduzida em modelos de conduta sustentáveis em todas as dimensões da atividade humana.
trans: The change in paradigm that the PS intends to carry out, in the context of achieving the objectives of decarbonization and energy transition, of transforming the production and consumption paradigm and of adapting and valuing the territory, imposes a strong commitment to knowledge, information and in environmental education, as decisive factors for changing behaviors, translated into sustainable models of conduct in all dimensions of human activity.

original_text: L’industria,   i   trasporti,   l’agricoltura,   gli   edifici   devono   riorientarsi   secondo   i   criteri   dell’efficienza,   del   contenimento   delle   emissioni   nocive,   dell’impiego   di   materiali   riciclabili   e   di   tecnologie   intelligenti   per   smaltire   i   rifiuti,   bonificare   i   terreni,   ottimizzare   il   ciclo   dell’acqua,   mettere   in   sicurezza   il   territorio,   incentivare   la   mobilità   a   basso   impatto   ambientale.
trans: Industry,  transport,  agriculture,  buildings  must  reorient  according  to  the  criteria  of  efficiency,  the  containment  of  noxious  emissions,  the  use  of  recyclable  materials  and  intelligent  technologies  to  dispose  of  waste,  reclaim  land,  optimize  the  cycle of water,  secure  the  territory,  encourage  mobility  with  low  environmental  impact.

original_text: DORIM ŞI PUTEM SĂ CONTRIBUIM LA CREAREA UNUI CLIMAT ÎN CARE FEMEILE SĂ-ŞI POATĂ MANIFESTA PE DEPLIN ROLUL DEOSEBIT DE IMPORTANT PE CARE ÎL AU ÎN SOCIETATE, CA PARTE STRUCTUTURALĂ A INTELIGENŢEI ŞI PROFESIONALISMULUI POPORULUI ROMÂN.PDSR recunoaşte că în societatea românească femeile sunt afectate, mai mult decât bărbaţii, de efectele negative ale tranziţiei, confruntându-se cu dificultăţi privind traiul zilnic, scăderea puterii de cumpărare, creşterea şi educarea copiilor.
trans: WE WANT AND CAN CONTRIBUTE TO THE CREATION OF A CLIMATE IN WHICH WOMEN CAN FULLY MANIFEST THE PARTICULARLY IMPORTANT ROLE THEY HAVE IN SOCIETY, AS A STRUCTURAL PART OF THE INTELLIGENCE AND PROFESSIONALISM OF THE ROMANIAN PEOPLE. PDSR recognizes that in Romanian society women are affected, more than men, from the negative effects of the transition, facing difficulties regarding daily living, decreased purchasing power, raising and educating children.
partyname: Party of Social Democracy of Romania

original_text: Awareness and education activities have been strengthened but so too has the whole area of enforcement which, for too long, had been the “poor relation” – indeed, comparing the first 6 months of 2001 with the corresponding period in 1997, on the spot fines for litter increased from less than 1,000 to more than 13,000 and the number of litter wardens employed more than trebled to 300.:  We have lost no time in responding to probably the greatest threat facing humanity – climate change.

Hlavními problémovými okruhy, v nichž bude třeba defi novat viditelnou  politickou alternativu k současnému vývoji v EU, jsou pokřivené a nedostatečné demokratické mechanismy, sklony  kobchodnímu protekcionismu, nákladná zemědělská politika, demografi cký útlum, legální i nelegální migrace a v důsledku toho měnící se sociální a demografi cká mapa Evropy,  zneužívání témat, jako je ochrana lidských práv nebo globální oteplování, k zavádění nových regulací, státní kontroly  a centrálního plánování.
trans: The main problem areas in which a visible political alternative to the current development in the EU will have to be defined are distorted and insufficient democratic mechanisms, tendencies towards trade protectionism, costly agricultural policy, demographic decline, legal and illegal migration and, as a result, changing social and demographic map of Europe, exploiting topics such as human rights protection or global warming to introduce new regulations, state control and central planning.

original_text: Tá bude zamestnancov koordinovať a distribuovať do rôznych oblastí – VPP, diaľnice – výstavba diaľničných úsekov, udržiavacie práce popri diaľniciach, pôdohospodárstvo – obrábanie polí, stráženie úrody, verejná a štátna správa, protipovodňové aktivity, značenie turistických chodníkov, práca v štátnych lesoch, obnova, opravy, rekonštrukcie budov verejnej a štátnej správy, národný projekt obnovy dediny, asistentské práce v profesionálnej armáde, asistenti na školách, rôzne práce v nemocniciach a podobne.
trans: It will coordinate and distribute employees to various areas - VPP, highways - construction of highway sections, maintenance work along highways, agriculture - tilling fields, guarding crops, public and state administration, anti-flood activities, marking hiking trails, work in state forests, restoration, repairs, reconstruction of public and state administration buildings, national village renewal project, assistant jobs in the professional army, assistants in schools, various jobs in hospitals and the like.

original_text: 50 ans après les indépendances, il est utile de réviser et d’adapter notre partenariat avec l’Afrique et notamment avec l’Afrique centrale afin de mieux relever ensemble, outre la lutte contre la pauvreté et pour la paix, les nouveaux défis que sont la démographie, les migrations, la sécurité énergétique, l’exploitation raisonnée des matières premières, la bonne gouvernance, les dérèglements climatiques et la préservation de la biodiversité, l’arrivée de nouveaux acteurs mondiaux avides de matières premières.
trans: 50 years after independence, it is useful to review and adapt our partnership with Africa and particularly with Central Africa in order to better address together, in addition to the fight against poverty and for peace, the new challenges that are demography, migration, energy security, the rational exploitation of raw materials, good governance, climate change and the preservation of biodiversity, the arrival of new global players hungry for raw materials.

original_text: And we’ll introduce a fair voting system, so that parliament better represents the views of Britain and better reflects its diversity - with more women and a greater proportion of ethnic minority MPs.”  SANDRA GIDLEY  LIBERAL DEMOCRAT SPOKESPERSON FOR WOMEN  THE LIBERAL DEMOCRAT PLEDGE FOR GREEN ACTION  Catastrophic climate change is the greatest man-made threat to the planet, leading to fertile plains turning to desert, extreme weather conditions, rising sea levels, the spread of diseases and water shortages.

Occorre incentivare e promuovere, in tutti i livelli di aggregazione territoriale, lo sviluppo di infrastrutture verdi in grado di sequestrare carbonio e compensare in parte le emissioni di gas serra, soprattutto in ambito urbano introducendo misure per fermare il consumo di suolo attraverso piani di riqualificazione del patrimonio edilizio esistente e, ove possibile, di ripristino delle condizioni ecosistemiche naturali dei luoghi, con particolare riferimento ai versanti montuosi oggetto di dissesto idrogeologico.
trans: It is necessary to encourage and promote, at all levels of territorial aggregation, the development of green infrastructures capable of sequestering carbon and partially offsetting greenhouse gas emissions, especially in urban areas by introducing measures to stop land consumption through land redevelopment plans. existing building heritage and, where possible, restoration of the natural ecosystem conditions of the places, with particular reference to mountain slopes subject to hydrogeological instability.

original_text: V Novi Sloveniji se zavzemamo za učinkovito črpanje kohezijskih sredstev, ki naj bodo primarno koriščena za razvoj manj razvitih področij in usmerjena v projekte, ki prinašajo višjo dodano vrednost, ob upoštevanju uresničevanja Strategije EU 2020 in štirih ključnih področij za gospodarsko rast ter ustvarjanje delovnih mest: raziskave in inovacije, informacijske in komunikacijske tehnologije, povečanje konkurenčnosti malih in srednje velikih podjetij ter podpora za prehod na gospodarstvo z nizkimi emisijami ogljika.
trans: In Nova Slovenia, we advocate for the efficient use of cohesion funds, which should primarily be used for the development of less developed areas and directed to projects that bring higher added value, taking into account the implementation of the EU 2020 Strategy and four key areas for economic growth and job creation: research and innovation, information and communication technologies, increasing the competitiveness of small and medium-sized enterprises and supporting the transition to a low-carbon economy.

original_text: El Estado de Bienestar español en su diseño original ha sido un éxito aunque hoy necesita modernizarse, ya que las condiciones han cambiado: las expectativas ciudadanas, el coste creciente de las tecnologías, la innovación, la demografía y las enfermedades crónicas, el reto climático y las desigualdades exigen un modelo nuevo, un modelo que busca una nueva relación con la ciudadanía, una ciudadanía que exige una gestión rigurosa y eficiente, que está bien informada, es activa y responsable, y no solo receptora pasiva de servicios.
trans: The Spanish Welfare State in its original design has been a success although today it needs to be modernized, since conditions have changed: citizen expectations, the increasing cost of technologies, innovation, demographics and chronic diseases, the climate challenge and Inequalities require a new model, a model that seeks a new relationship with citizens, a citizenry that demands rigorous and efficient management, that is well informed, active and responsible, and not just a passive recipient of services.

original_text: Tutte le attività economiche che migliorano e ripristinano la condizione dei circoli ambientali, riducono prelievi, non producono esternalità negative, si realizzano in forme immateriali e soddisfano bisogni immateriali, e che sono finalizzate a prodotti di qualità, “territorializzati”, a risparmio di materie prime e di energia dovranno invece essere sostenute attraverso la loro diretta promozione pubblica o indirettamente, tramite sostegni fiscali, crediti agevolati, costruzione di servizi, sviluppo della ricerca, e domanda pubblica.
trans: All economic activities that improve and restore the condition of environmental circles, reduce withdrawals, do not produce negative externalities, are carried out in immaterial forms and satisfy immaterial needs, and which are aimed at quality, "territorialized" products, saving raw materials and energy will instead have to be supported through their direct public promotion or indirectly, through fiscal supports, subsidized credits, construction of services, development of research, and public demand.

original_text: Britain forward not back  Chapter 7  International policy: A stronger country in a secure, sustainable and just world  Forward to international leadership, not back to isolation and powerlessness  1997: Marginalised in Europe, aid in decline and Bosnia in ruins  2005: Aid doubled, elections in Iraq and Afghanistan, Kosovo and Bosnia peaceful  2010: A strong Britain in a reforming Europe, 300 million out of poverty, global action on climate change  Britain forward not back  Globalisation means that events elsewhere have a direct impact at home.

Además del endurecimiento de la jubilación anticipada, los dos principales cambios son los contenidos en la Ley 23/2013: el nuevo mecanismo de revalorización de las pensiones, que se desvincula de la garantía del poder adquisitivo y condena a los pensionistas a un progresivo empobrecimiento, que se ha visto agravado por la incidencia del copago farmacéutico de los mismos y la introducción de un factor de sostenibilidad, a partir de 2019, del que resultarán pensiones menguantes en función de la evolución -previsiblemente al alza- de la esperanza de vida.
trans: In addition to the tightening of early retirement, the two main changes are those contained in Law 23/2013: the new pension revaluation mechanism, which is separated from the guarantee of purchasing power and condemns pensioners to progressive impoverishment, which has been aggravated by the incidence of their pharmaceutical co-payment and the introduction of a sustainability factor, starting in 2019, which will result in decreasing pensions depending on the evolution - foreseeably upward - of life expectancy.

original_text: Un sistema che appare oggi sempre più condizionato da logiche materialistiche, tecnocratiche e predatorie, e governato dalla finanza speculativa e da modelli di produzione e di consumo energivori, che oltre a non garantire un’equa distribuzione del prodotto a livello mondiale, fanno spesso un uso distorto dei beni della terra, mettendo a dura prova i più deboli e innescando processi d’alterazione degli ecosistemi d’oscura reversibilità - come il surriscaldamento globale - le cui insidiose conseguenze sono ormai asseverate dalla comunità scientifica internazionale.
trans: A system that today appears increasingly conditioned by materialistic, technocratic and predatory logic, and governed by speculative finance and energy-intensive production and consumption models, which, in addition to not guaranteeing a fair distribution of the product on a global level, often make distorted goods of the earth, putting the weakest to the test and triggering processes of alteration of ecosystems of obscure reversibility - such as global warming - whose insidious consequences are now asseverated by the international scientific community.

original_text: Elemento decisivo è rappresentato, in tali contesti, dal risanamento ambientale, territoriale e produttivo, facendo fuoriuscire tali realtà da logiche di sviluppo distorto nelle quali la sistematica cessione di sovranità pubblica nel campo della gestione del territorio ha consentito il prodursi di modelli di sviluppo basati sull’esaltazione dell’intervento edilizio, sulla crescita di un terziario scarsamente innovativo, sulla compromissione dell’ambiente naturale e sull’assenza di politiche infrastrutturali e di servizi adeguate a sostenere processi di diversificazione produttiva.
trans: A decisive element is represented, in these contexts, by environmental, territorial and productive recovery, making these realities escape from distorted development logics in which the systematic transfer of public sovereignty in the field of land management has allowed the production of development models based on exaltation of building intervention, on the growth of a poorly innovative tertiary sector, on the compromise of the natural environment and on the absence of infrastructure policies and services adequate to support processes of productive diversification.

original_text: Les relations internationales de l’Union européenne et de la Belgique sont marquées par de nombreux défis : des défis socio-économiques majeurs, l’épuisement de certaines ressources, et l’accaparement de ces ressources par quelques-uns, la diminution relative de la puissance américaine, l’émergence de puissances régionales, des Etats défaillants qui servent de base à des mouvements terroristes, des politiques aux parfums de guerre froide, les dépenses d’armement en Asie, la réponse à apporter à des enjeux mondiaux tels que le réchauffement climatique ou les grandes pandémies, les cyber-menaces, etc.
trans: The international relations of the European Union and Belgium are marked by numerous challenges: major socio-economic challenges, the exhaustion of certain resources, and the monopolization of these resources by a few, the relative decrease in American power, the emergence of regional powers, failed states which serve as bases for terrorist movements, policies with Cold War flavors, arms spending in Asia, the response to global issues such as global warming climate or major pandemics, cyber threats, etc.

original_text: Es preciso diseñar una estrategia de conservación del agua, teniendo en cuenta el calentamiento del planeta, la desertificación, la erosión, la contaminación, la falta de caudales,...La sobreexplotación la disminución de los acuíferos, el incremento de las actividades industriales y de ocio con alto consumo del recurso, así como la tendencia al abandono de la España seca hacen necesario cambiar las políticas segmentadas por un planteamiento global que incluya la política hidrológica desarrollando las siguientes actuaciones:  - Investigación permanente de los recursos hídricos superficiales y subterráneos.
trans: It is necessary to design a water conservation strategy, taking into account global warming, desertification, erosion, pollution, lack of flows,...Overexploitation, the decrease in aquifers, the increase in industrial activities and leisure activities with high consumption of the resource, as well as the tendency to abandon dry Spain, make it necessary to change segmented policies for a global approach that includes hydrological policy, developing the following actions: - Permanent investigation of surface and underground water resources.

original_text: Leállítjuk az energiaszektor további magánosítását, egyúttal növeljük a magyar közösségi tulajdonrészt.Az energiaellátás biztonságának és a gazdaságosságnak a biztosítása az állam feladata, a lakosság teherbíró képességének figyelembevételével.Az alaperőműveknek szánt gázerőműveket az atomenergia segítségével váltjuk ki.Csökkentjük hazánk külföldi energiahordozóktól való függését.Az energiafelhasználás mértékét korszerűsítésekkel csökkentjük.Segítjük a geotermikus energia hasznosítását, támogatjuk a megújuló energiatermelő megoldásokat.A kutatás-fejlesztés támogatásával ösztönözzük az új megoldások keresését.
trans: We will stop the further privatization of the energy sector, and at the same time increase the share of Hungarian community ownership. It is the responsibility of the state to ensure the safety and economy of energy supply, taking into account the population's carrying capacity. we reduce its extent with modernizations. We help the utilization of geothermal energy, we support renewable energy production solutions.

original_text: Si la cause principale de cette perte de biodiversité tient en priorité au réchauffement climatique, la destruction des habitats ainsi que les modes de culture et de pêche en sont aussi largement responsables Il convient donc, en dehors des actions destinées à réduire les émis sions de gazs à effet de serre et des nouvelles pratiques culturales, de prendre des mesures urgentes pour protéger les écosystèmes : - Abrogation des dispositions anti nature (eau, littoral, grands pré dateurs,…) et mise en chantier de dispositions correctrices, notamment sur la protection des rivières, les Parcs Nationaux et la politique sur les loup et les ours.
trans: If the main cause of this loss of biodiversity is primarily due to global warming, the destruction of habitats as well as farming and fishing methods are also largely responsible. It is therefore appropriate, apart from actions intended to reduce gas emissions greenhouse effect and new farming practices, to take urgent measures to protect ecosystems: - Repeal of anti-nature provisions (water, coastline, large predators, etc.) and implementation of corrective provisions, particularly on the protection of rivers, National Parks and wolf and bear policy.

original_text: Sul fronte dello sviluppo di una gestione sostenibile degli spostamenti casa-lavoro, il decreto ministeriale sulla “Mobilità sostenibile nelle aree urbane” del 27 marzo 1998 (Gazzetta Ufficiale n. 179 del 3 agosto 1998) all'articolo 2 individua le zone d'intervento nei comuni di cui all'allegato III del decreto del Ministro dell'ambiente e della tutela del territorio e del mare del 25 novembre 1994 nonché tutti gli altri comuni compresi nelle zone a rischio di inquinamento atmosferico individuate dalle regioni ai sensi degli articoli 3 e 9 dei decreti del Ministro dell'ambiente e della tutela del territorio e del mare del 20 maggio 1991.
trans: In terms of the development of sustainable management of home-work travel, the ministerial decree on "Sustainable mobility in urban areas" of 27 March 1998 (Official Gazette no. 179 of 3 August 1998) in article 2 identifies the areas of intervention in the municipalities referred to in Annex III of the decree of the Minister of the Environment and Protection of Land and Sea of ​​25 November 1994 as well as all other municipalities included in the areas at risk of air pollution identified by the regions pursuant to articles 3 and 9 of the decrees of the Minister of the Environment and Protection of Land and Sea of ​​20 May 1991.

original_text: Per   questo   l’Italia,   paese   contributore   netto   al   bilancio   europeo   e   che   sostiene   finanziariamente   lo   sforzo   di   salvataggio   dei   Paesi   sottoposti   al   programma   del   Fondo   Europeo   Salva-Stati,   deve   chiedere   all’Europa   politiche   orientate   nel   senso   di   una   maggiore   attenzione   alla   crescita   basata   su   finanze   pubbliche   sane,   un   mercato   interno   più   integrato   e   dinamico,   una   maggiore   solidarietà   finanziaria   attraverso   forme   di   condivisione   del   rischio,   una   maggiore   attenzione   alla   inclusione   sociale   e   alla   sostenibilità   ambientale.
trans: For  this  Italy,  a  net  contributor  country  to  the  European  budget  and  which  financially  supports  the  rescue  effort  of  the  countries  subjected  to  the  European  State-Based  Fund  programme,  must  ask  Europe  for  policies  oriented  in  the  sense  of  greater  attention  to  growth  based  on finance healthy  public  governments,  a  more  integrated  and  dynamic  internal  market,  greater  financial  solidarity  through  forms  of  risk  sharing,  greater  attention  to  social  inclusion  and  environmental  sustainability.

original_text: Nosotros proponemos la adopción de indicadores ambientales como el que mide el estado de la destrucción de la capa de ozono, el estado del calentamiento global a través del control de las emisiones de dióxido de carbono, de metano y de los demás gases de efecto invernadero (causados por la utilización de combustibles fósiles, en el transporte o en las centrales térmicas), el que mide la acidificación del aire a través del control de las emisiones de óxido de azufre o de óxido nítrico (causadas por las centrales térmicas o las refinerías de petróleo), el estado de la contaminación fotoquímica, cuyos efectos en las áreas mediterráneas pueden superar los de la acidificación del aire y que se genera a partir del dióxido de nitrógeno y de compuestos orgánicos volátiles que forman, por acción de la energía solar, ozono troposférico y agua oxigenada.
trans: We propose the adoption of environmental indicators such as the one that measures the state of the destruction of the ozone layer, the state of global warming through the control of emissions of carbon dioxide, methane and other greenhouse gases ( caused by the use of fossil fuels, in transportation or in thermal power plants), which measures the acidification of the air through the control of sulfur oxide or nitric oxide emissions (caused by thermal power plants or oil refineries). oil), the state of photochemical pollution, whose effects in Mediterranean areas can exceed those of air acidification and which is generated from nitrogen dioxide and volatile organic compounds that form, through the action of solar energy, ozone tropospheric and oxygenated water.

original_text: vyštudoval hydrogeológiu a inžiniersku geológiu na Prírodovedeckej fakulte Univerzity Komenského v Bratislave, následne si ekonomické vzdelanie doplnil kurzom ekonómie, marketingu a manažmentu na Ekonomickej univerzite v Bratislave. V oblasti energetiky absolvolal štúdium so zameraním na obnoviteľné zd roje v strednej a východnej Európe na Technische Universität vo Viedni. Svoju pracovnú kariéru začal ako hlavný radca na Inšpektoráte kúpeľov a žriedel pri Ministerstve zdravotníctva SR, neskôr pracoval ako projektový manažér pri príprave projektov zameraných na využívanie geotermálnej energie na Slovensku. Po polročnej pracovnej stáži v USA na pozícií obchodného analytika uskutočniteľnosti projektov fotovoltických, veterných a geotermálnych elektrární sa vrátil na Slovensko a začal podnikať v oblasti oblasti obnoviteľných zdrojov energií. V súčasnosti pôsobí ako koordinátor projektov cezhraničnej spolupráce medzi Slovenskom a Rakúskom so zameraním na inovatívne technológie a osvetu v oblasti efektívneho využívania energií. Hovorí plynule po nemecky a po anglicky.
trans: he studied hydrogeology and engineering geology at the Faculty of Natural Sciences of the Comenius University in Bratislava, then completed his economic education with a course in economics, marketing and management at the University of Economics in Bratislava. In the field of energy, he completed studies with a focus on renewable sources in Central and Eastern Europe at the Technische Universität in Vienna. He started his working career as a chief advisor at the Inspectorate of Spas and Springs at the Ministry of Health of the Slovak Republic, later he worked as a project manager in the preparation of projects focused on the use of geothermal energy in Slovakia. After a six-month internship in the USA as a business analyst for the feasibility of photovoltaic, wind and geothermal power plant projects, he returned to Slovakia and started a business in the field of renewable energy sources. He currently works as a coordinator of cross-border cooperation projects between Slovakia and Austria, focusing on innovative technologies and education in the field of efficient energy use. He speaks German and English fluently.
